Posts.Content: God Bless you for writing such an honest and heartfelt post! Whenever I hear the term “New Normal” I want to either scream or cry! There’s absolutely nothing normal...new or otherwise about our situation ! I compare the way we now live to living on a roller coaster...and I’ve always despised coasters! I beg to get off and have my old life back. Odd as this will sound, at times, the only time I feel I belong is when I’m at the Cancer Center. It’s there that I’m surrounded by people who know what I’m going through when no one else really does. I try so hard to stay upbeat, but there are those times as we all know. Your blog was amazing, thank you. You have a true gift! Hugs...Katie xoxo 💕💕💕
Posts.Title: The clerk called me "Sir" and my visit to Memorial Sloan Kettering.

Posts.Content: Thank you for sharing May with us...and thank you for letting us know of her passing. God Bless you and all those that loved her, for she will forever remain in your hearts! 💕❤️💕 Katie
Posts.Title: In Memoriam, "New Challenges"
